alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Montgomery; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Montgomery, Bath, south central Fleming and west central Rowan Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mount Sterling, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ewington, Stoops, Coons Station, Upper Spencer and Lower Spencer around 550 PM EDT. Sharpsburg, Flat Creek, Stepstone, Howards Mill, Oggs Station and Walkers Crossing around 555 PM EDT. Peeled Oak around 600 PM EDT. Owingsville, Reynoldsville, Kendall Springs, Preston and Crooks around 605 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bourbon Furnace, Olympia, Marshall, Salt Lick, Slate Valley, Craigs, Peasticks, Wyoming, Odessa, Oakley, Polksville and Grange City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
